events.message: I received my order yesterday but want to request a refund because the item doesn’t match the description and I no longer want to keep it.
The system has identified the customer's concern as a refund request based on keywords related to returning the product and money back.
The case was assigned to agent Sarah M., who specializes in processing refunds and return requests.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request and will guide you through the next steps.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product has been opened or used, so we can proceed with the refund process?
The order number is 12345, and I have not opened or used the product. It arrived in good condition but simply is not what I expected.

Thank you for the information. I’ve initiated the refund for your order. Please return the item using our prepaid shipping label, and the refund will be processed within 5 business days after receipt.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick response and clear instructions. I will send the item back as soon as possible.
The refund process has been set in motion. We expect to finalize the refund after the returned product is received, and you will get an email confirmation accordingly.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund on your account and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
I’ve received the refund successfully. Thanks for your help, everything was handled smoothly and I appreciate your support.
We are glad the refund was processed to your satisfaction. Closing this case now, and feel free to contact us anytime if you need further assistance.
